Text

Beauty is about to tame [her]107-her beast … [Researcher Maggie Donovan]30-maggie has no luck with [men]108-men , and it does n’t help that [she]30-maggie ca n’t keep [her]30-maggie eyes off of [[her]30-maggie sexy boss]109-her sexy boss – [the one [everyone else in [the office]112-the office]111-everyone else in the office calls [The Beast]31-the beast]110-the one everyone else in the office calls the beast . Relationships in [the office]112-the office are forbidden . So [no one]114-no one is more surprised than [Maggie]30-maggie when [she]30-maggie pretends to be [[his]115-his fiancée]116-his fiancée to save [him]115-his during a difficult situation . Not only has [she]30-maggie put [her]30-maggie job on the line , but the future of [the company]117-the company . [Billionaire Benjamin Gale III]32-benjamin does n’t believe in love or romance , but the look on [[his]32-benjamin mother]118-his mother ’s face when [Maggie]30-maggie tells [her]118-his mother that [she]30-maggie ’s [his]32-benjamin fiancée is worth millions . Instead of firing [her]30-maggie for [her]30-maggie insubordination , [he]32-benjamin goes along with the ruse . In [his]32-benjamin arms – and in [his]32-benjamin bed – she’d be everything [he]32-benjamin could ever want … which is why [he]32-benjamin ca n’t have [her]30-maggie . But if [he]32-benjamin does n’t let [her]30-maggie go , [they]119-they ’ll lose everything …

Chapter One [Benjamin Gale III]32-benjamin rubbed [his]32-benjamin temples , let out an exasperated sigh , and then leaned back in [his]32-benjamin chair . [He]32-benjamin did n’t really have a choice . This was [his]32-benjamin life . [[His]32-benjamin wife]132-his wife . [[His]32-benjamin world]133-his world . [[His]32-benjamin baby]134-his baby . Over the five years since [[his]32-benjamin father]138-his father had passed away , [he]32-benjamin ’d dedicated [his]32-benjamin life to trying to make things right . [He]32-benjamin ’d quit partying . Stopped fucking around , and [his]32-benjamin whole life had been focused on this . On [his]32-benjamin work . Chapter Eight Four days . That was how long [she]30-maggie and [Benjamin]32-benjamin had been hanging out , after agreeing at the hockey game to become [friends]546-friends for real , after becoming fake engaged . Chapter Ten [Maggie]30-maggie navigated [the crowded hall]726-the crowded hall slowly , watching the drinks in [her]30-maggie hand cautiously . [She]30-maggie ’d opted for red wine , while getting [Benji]62-benji [his]62-benji old - fashioned . [She]30-maggie smiled when [she]30-maggie remembered [his]62-benji reaction when [she]30-maggie ’d asked [him]62-benji if [he]62-benji ’d like one . The last time [she]30-maggie ’d gone to [[his]62-benji penthouse]727-his penthouse , [she]30-maggie ’d talked to [William]37-william for a few minutes . [He]37-william was all too willing to impart information about [[his]37-william boss]728-his boss . And [she]30-maggie was all too willing to listen . Chapter Fourteen The second [they]879-they entered [[Benjamin]32-benjamin ’s apartment]882-benjamin ’s apartment , [he]859-he pulled [Maggie]30-maggie into [his]859-he arms and kissed [her]30-maggie . [He]859-he ’d already excused [William]37-william and sent [him]37-william off , so [they]879-they were finally alone . After watching the musical with [him]859-he , [her]30-maggie recent choices made perfect sense . All throughout the show , the words [the characters]883-the characters sang had echoed pretty much every feeling and conversation [they]879-they ’d had about taking chances on [one another]342-one another , and not being afraid to leap blindly into something that could possibly be everything . Toward the end , during an emotional song about learning to live without [the one [you]886-you loved]885-the one you loved , [he]859-he had glanced over at [her]30-maggie , seen the tears streaming down [her]30-maggie face , and caught [her]30-maggie hand in [his]859-he . And [he]859-he had n’t let go of [her]30-maggie for the rest of the musical . It was as if that entire score had been written for [her]30-maggie , to teach [her]30-maggie a lesson .
